title: New: Abstract Cannon – Early Morning Intervention
content:
Photo by Tommy Petroni

When it comes to bit sized slices of expression, Abstract Cannon is a good place to start. 2 minutes of raw as shit flows, zoned out beats and anger; all however, with just the right amount of humanity.

Early Morning Intervention is taken from the Foam Mountains Mixtape.

Check out Abstract Cannon at SXSW on March 16.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
